prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Piano, Guitar, Drums, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Synth Pad, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Drums, Guitar, and Synth Pad, omitting Reed.

Style 3:
Reed is absent from this song, which includes Synth Pad, Piano, Guitar, and Drums.
